item.title: Hisense Chromebook C12
item.description: The Hisense Chromebook C12 is a cheap laptop with a 11.6-inch screen powered by a 1.8 GHz quad-core Rockchip RK3288 Coretex-A17 processor and equipped with 2 GB RAM and 32 GB eMMC.

item.title: Hisense Chromebook C11
item.description: The Hisense Chromebook C11 is a very cheap laptop with a 11.6-inch screen powered by a quad-core Rockchip RK3288 Coretex-A17 processor clocked at 1.8 GHz.
